shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content_distilled: Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.

shorts.title: Man arrested after allegedly threatening to murder trooper
shorts.title_distilled: Man arrested after allegedly threatening to murder trooper.
shorts.description: LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— One man faces terrorism charges in Lackawanna County after police say he threatened a state trooper. 30-year-old Jordan Mayo is charged with two counts of making terroristic threats and three harassment charges. Investigators say Mayo called state police 19 times in a single day, threatening to murder a state trooper. Police say Mayo [...]

shorts.title: Lackawanna County Code Blue extended
shorts.description: LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Lackawanna County and the City of Scranton extended a previously declared Code Blue Frigid Weather Alert for Sunday and Monday night. The Code Blue will be in effect 8:00 p.m. Sunday, January 4, until 7:00 a.m. Monday, January 5, and 8:00 p.m. Monday, January 5, and 7:00 a.m. Tuesday, January 5. [...]

shorts.title: Woman sentenced for vacation fraud faces more charges

shorts.description: SCOTT TWP., LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A woman serving time for theft related to vacation bookings is now facing more charges. Eileen Miner, 70, pled guilty to several felony theft charges in September 2025 in relation to her West Pittson travel agency, Thompson Tours. Miner was sentenced to 20-60 months of incarceration, 35 years of [...]
